Effect: If the weapon’s damage is dealt to a creature’s hit points, it ignores up to 8 points of DT and the creature’s armor gains a level of decay.
Damage is 1d4+1, no agility mod; target takes 1 fatigue. If it brings target to 0 HP, they heal 1 unless hit to head/eyes.
Weapon’s range modifiers are both increased by 4 and it loses its spread property.
Damage +3, ignores 3 DT, range mods +4. Loses spread and gains decay every second attack.
Gains Destructive and Mangle properties. Ignores 2 DT.
Half damage, gains Incendiary.
3d6 explosive to each target in 5 ft, target prone unless Strength save.
Damage -1 but ignores up to 6 DT.
Damage +2. If target brought to 0 HP, hits next creature in line.
Deals extra crit damage if HP hit. If damage reduced by DT, loses crit bonus and is halved.
Gains Destructive.
Gains Breakable and +3 damage.
Gains Incendiary.
+5 damage, short range mod -2.
+3 damage, ignores 3 DT, +2 to range mods. Gains decay every second attack.
Damage 1d4+2, no agility mod. Target gets 1 fatigue. If brought to 0 HP, heals 1 unless to head/eyes.
Range mods tripled, gains Accurate and Destructive, loses Spread and Powerful.
Same as Slug, but double damage to Robot/Power Armor.

This syringe allows you to load it with a stimpak, the target gains the effects of the stimpak.
This syringe allows you to load it with a chem, the target gains the effects of the chem. Note: You cannot load a chem that has an inhaler.
Target becomes poisoned fro 3 turns and takes 1d6 poison damage at the start of each of their turns.
Target's DT is reduced by 3 for 1 minute.
Target becomes frightened for 3 rounds.
Target spends all of its AP on its next turn to attack the nearest creature to it.
Target gains one level of bleeding.
Target becomes slowed for 2 turns.
Target becomes Deafened for 3 rounds.
Target becomes Blinded for 3 rounds.
All creatures beyond 30 feet of the target creature become invisible to them for 1 minute.

If the target's Endurance is a 4 or below, they fall unconscious for 1 hour. Otherwise, they become Dazed for their next two turns and fall unconscious for 1 hour at the end of their third turn. Creatures dazed in this way can remove this condition and prevent falling unconscious by using any chem with the stimulant property.
